text:
Hi Everyone,
Would anyone have any ideas about Developer account, I am facing issue with upload marketplace app for APP icon and other Assets. Please advise

Hi everyone

I have a web platform where sellers can integrate their HubSpot account using a private app access token and Hub ID, without using OAuth. Integration on the web platform is facilitated through rudderstack. I need guidance on creating a public app to list on the HubSpot Marketplace, enabling sellers to integrate their private app via this public app. If possible, could you provide instructions on how to proceed?
